abstract: A Chinese court rejected Apple’s claim to own the iPad trademark in China, which could stifle sales of the popular tablet in some Chinese cities. Apple has been butting heads with Proview Technology, which made an unsuccessful attempt to sell a tablet computer called I-Pad.

headline.main: IPad Faces Trademark Trouble in China
